TV-Show-Webapp Documentation
============================

Welcome to the TV-Show-Webapp documentation! This is a social media platform for TV and movie enthusiasts to share reviews, track their watching habits, and connect with other users.

Contents
--------

   :caption: User Documentation:

   installation
   usage
   troubleshooting
